extendedInfo.description: The application will help the meeting organizer to gather meeting notes and help attendees stay focused, restrict the meeting duration. Every meeting is immediately followed by a meeting report with all the collected issues, action items and meeting details.Features- User friendly, intuitive interface, most of functions are managed by several clicks - Separate timers for meeting and for participants- Highlighted time counter if it exceeds the predefined time limit- A note, action item, issues can be added by several clicks and then managed in a simple way- Excel report with meeting notes, who is talkative or silent, and elapsed time collected historically. Can be sent over email to participants- Participant details, photo can be imported from Phone Contacts. A photo can be also captured using a phone camera or taken from a picture gallery

reviews.title: Still under development
reviews.comment: Apparently, this app isn\'t ready yet and the download is actually Scrum Master Assistant (older version) from EAN playing a stand-in (and so 2 stars). If you want to take meeting notes, wait. Install the updated Scrum Master Assistant from the proper listing if you want just a timer + to-do list.
reviews.author: A Google User

reviews.comment: Never opened. Force closed every time I tried to open it on the Epic. #fail
reviews.author: A Google User

reviews.title: Not what its states on the listing
reviews.comment: Very limited timer of some sort. Not intuitive oe easy to use
